1.content: You take your first steps into the woods. You hear some rustling in the bush to your right.
1.title: The walk

11.content:
You decide to investigate the rustling. You move the foliage aside and see a green slimey looking create. You have no idea what it is so you aproach it with your hand out trying to make friends with it.

The slime crawls into your hand it is very small. It seems hungry so you give it a cracker you brought with you. The slime sucks it in and the cracker dissolves. The slime grows noticably larger. The slime then jumps out of your hand and onto the ground and makes its way to a big puddle.

The slime sucks in all the water and grows to about half your size. It comes closer to you. Ou just stare at it, and suddenly it starts to force itself into your mouth. Your stomach starts to expand from the slime.
11.title: Investigate the rustling

choices: Your belly shrinks as the rest of you fattens up
Your belly shrinks, but you're suddenly hit with a burdening hunger
Nothing happens, you're just really hungry
111.content:
You just stand there, shocked as the strange creature oozes its way down your throat. Your stomach begins to feels funny, as if it were stretching, and you glance down to see it doing just that. Your shirt slowly tightens as the slime makes room for itself in your stomach. Your hands move to the expanding bulge, feeling it get larger and tighter.

You're frightened, you want this to stop, but not the way it has. You collapse on the ground as the slime finishes feeding you itself, and you look down once more. What was once a thin, fit stomach was now a large globe, extending well into your lap as you sat. Your shirt has now ridden up to your chest, leaving your swollen middle in the open.

Your belly suddenly starts rumbling as you rub it, and suddenly...
111.title: Shock and Slimes

1111.content:
You rub your spherical stomach for a few moments before it begins to rumble. You retract your hands back as it shrinks before your eyes. Your stomach rumbles again.

Suddenly, your clothes feel tight. You look down and are met with your breasts expanding in your white v-neck shirt, your D-cup bra becoming tight very quickly. Before you can react to that, however, you feel your arms plump up in the sleeves of your yellow jacket and your belly start to press on the waist band of your skinny jeans, your expanding legs making seams already start to pop.

You're too flabbergasted by this to really react, you only watch as your body finishes plumping up.

Your bra is barely holding on, the cups overflowing with boob. Your belly popped the button on your jeans and is laying on your lap, the start of a fold slightly evident. The sleeves of your jacket are full of fat, bingo wings clearly shown. Your hips are wide and your butt large, finally even with your breasts. Your thick legs ripped apart your skinny jeans, your thighs touching all the way down.

You slowly stood up, feeling the cool air against all your new skin.
1111.title: Slime becomes Fat

11112.content: As you are recovering from the previous slime, you notice a large pink slime slowly making its way towards you. As it's moving, you can see it slowly growing as it swallows up and dissolves the grass beneath its mass. Once it finally approaches you, it's a little less than half the size of you.
11112.title: Another Slime apporaches

choices: Free the pig so you can have a nice fat lunch
Let the pig continue to grow
12.content: You keep walking forward and ignore the rustling. All of the sudden you hear some squealing. It sounds like it is coming from a pig. You get closer and see a pig entangled in vines and the pig looks very fat. Upon further inspection you notice a vine in the pigs mouth and the pig is swelling.
12.title: Keep walking forward

13.content:
You run away from the rustling scared of what i could be. With out looking you end up running into a bunch of vines. You struggle trying to free yourself from the vines but your stuck.

All of the sudden you notice one of the vines moving on its own. It approaches you closer and closer. You are stareing at the vines curiously. The vine then shoves itself into your mouth and starts to pump something into your mouth. Unable to fight it you swallow as the vine continues.

You start to feel full and look down to realize your distended belly. You try to scream but only muffled noises can be heard as you continue to be filled by the vine.
13.title: Run in the opposite direction

info.brief_description: Fatten up sarah on her venture into the woods
info.description:
You are a girl named Sarah, who decides she wants to go exploring into the woods outside her town. The woods is inhabbitied by some creatures such as slimes and plants that fatten up their prey. You choose how she grows.
No death
No popping
Try to keep the story going
